org.piwik.sdk.dispatcher

Class Dispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.piwik.sdk.dispatcher.Dispatcher

  • public class Dispatcher
extends Object
    Sends json POST request to tracking url http://piwik.example.com/piwik.php with body

    { "requests": [ "?idsite=1&url=http://example.org&action_name=Test bulk log Pageview&rec=1", "?idsite=1&url=http://example.net/test.htm&action_name=Another bul k page view&rec=1" ], "token_auth": "33dc3f2536d3025974cccb4b4d2d98f4" }

        Connection timeout in milliseconds
        Returns:
        timeout in milliseconds

      • setConnectionTimeOut

        public void setConnectionTimeOut(int timeOut)
        Timeout when trying to establish connection and when trying to read a response. Values take effect on next dispatch.
        Parameters:
        timeOut - timeout in milliseconds

      • setDispatchInterval

        public void setDispatchInterval(long dispatchInterval)
        Packets are collected and dispatched in batches, this intervals sets the pause between batches.
        Parameters:
        dispatchInterval - in milliseconds

      • getDispatchInterval

        public long getDispatchInterval()

      • launch

        private boolean launch()

      • forceDispatch

        public boolean forceDispatch()
        Starts the dispatcher for one cycle if it is currently not working. If the dispatcher is working it will skip the dispatch interval once.

      • submit

        public void submit(String query)
